posts.post_text: January 28, 2016 at 7:55 PM#3LUA is a scripting language which is implemented in GMA2 since v3.1.0.x and can be used to do tasks beyond the regular programmer, where macros are just "sequenced" command tasks from the command line. For specific LUA questions i would recommend the LUA Plugin forum, which can be foundHERE

posts.author: Hwellink
posts.post_text: February 2, 2016 at 8:33 PM#4It is, however, possible to run LUA commands directly from the commandline, and that means also from a macro. The correct syntax isCode[color=#66FF00]LUA[/color] "--LUA Syntax"If you want to run a plugin, simply callCode[color=#66FF00]Plugin[/color] xWith Regards,Harm Wellink
